content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Online features for Sound Shapes will no longer be playable from January 31, 2019 at 12:00 PM PT. Functionality will be affected in the following ways:
o You will be able to play the campaign and all DLC purchases as well as create your own levels.
o You will not be able to share your levels with the community or download community created levels.

Now available on PS4™, PS3™, and PS Vita systems. Part platformer, part music creator, Sound Shapes™ is the award winning & critically acclaimed game from Queasy Games (Everyday Shooter) that combines sight and sound into a truly unique gaming experience. Play through albums by Beck, deadmau5, and Jim Guthrie all beautifully illustrated by artists from Capy (SUPER TIME FORCE, Might & Magic: COH), Pyramid Attack (Jabbawaki, Guitar Hero), and Superbrothers (Sword & Sworcery). And when you've completed the Campaign, flip through the Community Milkcrate for a selection of developer and guest curated albums that feature the best of the best from the Sound Shapes community OR check out the Level Editor (a full-on music synthesizer!) to create your own musical levels! Practically infinite replay value!For one price, get Sound Shapes™ on PS4™, PS3™ and PlayStation®Vita systems. Purchase it on your PS4™ system and it will automatically appear for download on your PS3™ and PS Vita systems .Some features such as cross-save require more than one platform version of the software. One-time license fee for play on purchasing account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with purchasing account. Purchasing account may download item to up to 2 activated PlayStation®Vita systems and 2 activated PS3™ systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account.

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.  This account may download item to up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems and 2 PS3™ systems activated with this Sony Entertainment Network account.

©2012 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Sound Shapes is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC.
